products.name: Dell Inspiron 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7-4510U / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: With the Dell Inspiron 15, you'll experience the innovation of modern technology. Featuring a sleeker design, the Inspiron 15 is thinner and lighter than previous models and brushed with an elegant aluminum finish. You'll also enjoy it for a longer period of time, with a single battery charge lasting more than seven hours.

products.name: ASUS X Series 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Dual-Core Celeron N2830/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy multitasking power in a sophisticated, ergonomically-designed laptop. Home to a reliable Intel Celeron processor and boasting SonicMaster Lite audio technology for amazing sound whether you're watching a movie or listening to music, this 15.6" ASUS X Series laptop can take on your everyday computing tasks and entertainment without a hitch.

products.name: Lenovo G50 15.6" Laptop - Black (AMD A6-6310 / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The 15.6" Lenovo G50 is perfect for everyday use. Loaded with a host of features including a quad-core AMD processor, HD graphics, an integrated DVD drive, and Dolby Audio-certified stereo speakers, you'll enjoy a full multimedia experience whether you're at home or on the go.

products.name: ASUS F Series 15.6" Laptop - Dark Grey (Intel Core i7-4500u/750GB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1) - English
products.shortDescription: ASUS F Series notebooks are designed for people from all walks of life, from students to burgeoning entrepreneurs. A dual-core processor provides multitasking power to handle all your open apps, and SonicMaster technology with ASUS AudioWizard provides high quality, omnidimensional sound for immersive gaming and entertainment.

products.name: HP 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Celeron N2840 / 500GB HDD / 4GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The thin HP 15-F018CA laptop offers all the features you need to carry out daily computing tasks on the go. Weighing about five pounds, it houses a full-sized island-style keyboard for typing ease, and its 15.6" display is great for watching HD content, or editing photos and videos.

products.name: Acer Aspire E15 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium processor N3530/1TB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected with Acer's Aspire E15, a lightweight but powerful notebook designed to tackle everyday tasks with efficiency and ease. Click through Windows 8 live tiles to access your whopping 1TB worth of photos and files, stream video from WiFi or Bluetooth to its vibrant 15.6" monitor, or connect to an HDTV for a cinematic experience.

products.name: Acer Iconia One 7" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet with Intel Atom Z2560 Processor - Black
products.shortDescription: Made to fit easily in your hand, the Acer Iconia One 7 tablet has everything you need for browsing, communicating, travelling and shopping. Enjoy brilliant images with wide viewing angles, and tap your way through mobile games, apps and websites. It comes with the Android Jelly Bean OS for seamless multitasking and access to Google Play.

products.name: HP Stream S7-5701CA 7" 32GB Windows 8.1 Tablet With Intel Atom Z3735G Processor - Black Licorice
products.shortDescription: Stay on top of your digital world, whether for work or play, with the HP Stream 7 tablet. Equipped with a 4th Gen Intel processor and 1GB of RAM, this seven-inch tablet houses the power you need to carry out daily computing tasks while on the go. Access content from the cloud with Office 365 and enjoy an intuitive Windows 8.1 interface.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1" 16GB Android 4.4 Tablet With 1.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor - White
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10-inch tablet is perfect for entertainment at home and on the go. With MHL capability, you can connect the tablet to your HDTV to enjoy multimedia content on the big screen. A 1.2GHz dual-core processor keeps things running smoothly so downloading apps, playing games or streaming movies become quick and effortless.

products.name: Dell Inspiron i3531 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium N3530/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Revel in every movie, photo, game, and more with the Dell Inspiron 15 laptop's vibrant 15.6" HD screen plus the power of an Intel Pentium processor, 4GB RAM, and spacious 500GB hard drive. Designed for multimedia enjoyment, this powerful laptop was built to last as well as perform.

products.name: Acer 11.6" Chomebook - White (Intel Celeron N2830 / 16GB eMMC / 2GB RAM / Chrome OS)
products.shortDescription: Running on the speedy and responsive Chrome OS, the Acer Chromebook 11 makes it easy to work and play while on the go. With up to an 8.5-hour battery life and wireless AC connectivity, you can access and share protected content across various devices anytime. Enjoy your Chromebook outside in sunlight thanks to an 11.6" anti-glare display.

products.name: Acer Switch 10 10.1" 32GB  Windows 8.1 Tablet With Intel AtomTM Z3735F Quad-Core Processor - Silver
products.shortDescription: This Acer Aspire Switch 10 tablet's Zero Air Gap and LumiFlex technologies allow you to clearly view visuals on the 10.1" multitouch screen while you're outside. The Snap Hinge enables smooth transitioning between 4 usage modes.

products.name: Apple iPad mini 16GB With Wi-Fi - White
products.shortDescription: iPad mini features a beautiful 7.9-inch display, iSight and FaceTime cameras, the A5 chip, ultrafast wireless, and up to 10 hours of battery life*. And over 300,000 apps on the App Store made for iPad also work with iPad mini**. So it's an iPad in every way, shape, and slightly smaller form.

products.name: Dell Inspiron i3542 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium 3558U Processor/500GB HDD/4GB RAM)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a multimedia experience with this Dell Inspiron i3542 laptop. Powered by a dual-core Intel Pentium 3558U processor and 4GB RAM, it has the functionality you need for your daily tasks and entertainment needs.

products.name: Seagate Backup Plus 1.5TB 2.5" Portable External Hard Drive (STDR1500101)
products.shortDescription: Back up all your important data easily with the Seagate Backup Plus. Featuring USB 3.0 connectivity, the sleek metal design keeps your digital life safe and sound, whether from your computer, mobile device, or even the cloud.

products.name: Acer Aspire E15 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium N3530/1TB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected with Acer's Aspire E15, a lightweight but powerful notebook designed to tackle everyday tasks with efficiency and ease. Swipe through Windows 8 live tiles to access your whopping 1TB worth of photos and files, stream video from WiFi or Bluetooth to its vibrant 15.6" monitor, or connect to an HDTV for a cinematic experience.

products.name: HP 13.3" Laptop - Horizon Blue (Intel Celeron N2840 / 32GB HDD / 2GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Stay on top of your digital world, whether for work or play, with the HP 13-C010CA laptop. Equipped with a 2.16GHz Intel processor and 2GB of RAM, this 13.3" laptop houses the power you need to carry out daily computing tasks while on the go. Easily access content from the cloud and enjoy an intuitive Windows 8.1 interface.

products.name: ASUS 10.1" 16GB Transformer Book with Wi-Fi - Black
products.shortDescription: The ASUS Transformer Book combines the productive power of a laptop with the convenient fun factor of a tablet, all in one device. With efficient quad-core processing, dual cameras and Bluetooth connectivity, this touchscreen tablet has everything you need to get work done and stay connected just about anywhere.

products.name: Samsung 24" LED Monitor With 5ms Response Time (LS24D390HL/ZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Whether for everyday use or gaming, the Samsung 24" Touch of Colour monitor is equipped to meet your needs. It delivers a high-quality picture that's complemented with an ultra-high resolution. Enhancing your viewing experience is a wide viewing angle that allows you to see consistent colour and contrast ratio.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Pro 3 12" 128GB Windows 8.1 Pro Tablet With Intel Core i5 Processor - Silver
products.shortDescription: The tablet that can replace your laptop. Whether you call it a hybrid, convertible, or 2 in 1, the new Surface Pro 3 is in a category of its own. With a stunning 12" display in a sleek magnesium frame, Surface Pro 3 has all the power and performance of a laptop in an incredibly lightweight, versatile form. It may just be the ultimate device.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air 13.3" Intel Core i5 1.4GHz 128GB - Silver - English
products.shortDescription: Meet your new go-everywhere, do-everything companion, the 13.3-inch MacBook Air. It doesn't take up much space, is in great shape, and, is ready to take on anything with a 1.3GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 processor and 8GB of RAM. Faster graphics, all-day battery life, and even faster flash storage.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab3 Lite 7" 8GB Android 4.2 Tablet with Marvell PXA986 Dual-Core Processor - White
products.shortDescription: A great entertainment experience lies within your hands with the Galaxy Tab 3. Slimmer and lighter than its predecessor, the improved usability and flexibility delivers lightning-quick downloads and uninterrupted multimedia streaming. And thanks to a long lasting battery, you can stay connected on the go longer without worrying about charging.

products.name: HP 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium N3540/750GB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The thin HP 15-R138CA laptop offers all the features you need to carry out daily computing tasks on the go. At just under five pounds, it houses a full-sized island-style keyboard for typing ease, and its 15.6" display is great for watching HD content, or editing photos and videos.

products.name: ASUS Zenbook UX303 13.3" Touchscreen Ultrabook - Smoky Brown (Intel Core i7/128GB SSD/8GB RAM)
products.shortDescription: For work, play, or any task in between, the ASUS Zenbook UX303 Ultrabook keeps up. Thanks to an Intel Core i7 processor, 8GB RAM, and 128GB solid state drive, this Ultrabook will keep things running smoothly whether you're editing photos or streaming a Full HD movie. The 13.3" touchscreen offers a fun, intuitive way to interact with the Ultrabook.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 15 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7-4510U/1TB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Loaded with an Intel Core processor, 8GB RAM and a 1TB hard drive, the Dell Inspiron 15 provides the functionality and performance you need for everyday use. Thanks to a sleek, lightweight design that's 21% thinner and 19% lighter than its predecessor, this laptop is suited for mobility, and the 15.6" touchscreen allows you to navigate with ease.

products.name: Acer Aspire E 11.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Celeron N2840/32GB SSD+HDD/2GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Take your digital world along for the ride with this compact and handy 11.6" Acer Aspire E 11 laptop. Weighing just less than three pounds, it fits nicely in your bag while housing the hardware to tackle all your everyday computing needs. Work with office apps, chat with family from across the country and watch HD films on your big-screen TV.

products.name: Canon imageCLASS Monochrome All-In-One Laser Printer (MF216N)
products.shortDescription: Streamline your small or home business printing, copying, scanning and faxing with the Canon ImageClass MF216n All-in-One Laser Printer.  This efficient device features a customizable touch panel to make navigation and task completion easy, while Ethernet connectivity helps you share printing, scanning and PC faxing without complication.

products.name: HP Pavilion 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Silver (HP Hexa-Core / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Experience serious performance in a stunning design with this 15.6-inch HP Pavilion 15-p168ca laptop. The HD BrightView touch display delivers crisp visuals. Equipped with several connectivity options, Beats Audio speakers and a hexa-core processor, it has all you need to be productive and entertained.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 13.3" Intel Core i5 2.6GHz Laptop with Retina Display - English
products.shortDescription: Unbelievably sharp in many ways, from its amazingly clear and detailed Retina display to fast and responsive flash-based architecture, the 13" MacBook Pro with Retina display is an impressive laptop all-around. It's built to take on even the most demanding tasks, like graphics-intensive gaming, and power-hungry editing applications.

products.name: ASUS Transformer 10.1" 32GB Windows 8 Tablet With Intel Bay Trail Quad-Core Processor - Black
products.shortDescription: The ASUS Transformer Book T100TA combines the productive power of a laptop with the convenient fun factor of a tablet, all in one device. Paired with the high-quality keyboard dock, this touchscreen tablet has everything you need to get work done and stay connected just about anywhere.

products.name: Acer Aspire V 11.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Silver (Intel Celeron N2940/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Take your digital world along for the ride with this lightweight 11.6" Acer Aspire V 11 Touch laptop. Its slim design fits nicely in your bag while housing the hardware to tackle all your everyday computing needs. Easily navigate your screen with touch functionality, chat online with family and watch HD content on your big-screen TV.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 15 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Core i5-4210U/ 1TB HDD/ 8GB RAM/ Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Revel in every movie, photo, game and more with the Dell Inspiron 15 laptop's vibrant 15.6" HD screen plus the power of an Intel Pentium processor, 8GB RAM, and spacious 1TB hard drive.
